WorkItem.Description:
Description - Items that require Trophies of the Crusade to purchase are no longer able to be filtered correctly.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Rawr v2.3.5 or v2.3.4 or v2.3.3.
2. Select an item slot that has a item that is purchased with a Trophy of the Crusade as an upgrade/downgrade possibility.
3. Set the filters to show only items that can be purchased with just Badges of Triumph.
4. Observe that the items requiring a Trophy of the Crusade are still being displayed.
 
Version Number:  2.3.5, 2.3.4, 2.3.3  (Note: In version 2.3.2 the filtering of these items is correct.  The loss of filtering is observed post-2.3.2).
 
Additional Details:  Refreshing the item cache does not solve the problem.
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] Loss of Item Filtering for Specific Equipment
